en: This is an example. If you use 'EXAMPLE_STRING' for things like character names it will show this text instead
This mod's translation file is working correctly!
If your string contains a comma like this, you need to wrap the string in double quotes, otherwise it a) won't load, and b) will stop any strings below it from loading.
Note that the only custom file in this directory is 'modname.csv'. The other files are generated automatically when you add a CSV to the Godot editor's filesystem
